Title: Exempts payments in lieu of taxes received or receivable with regards to renewable energy projects from local governments' tax cap calculations
Summary: Exempts payments in lieu of taxes received or receivable with regards to renewable energy projects from local governments' tax cap calculations; defines term.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to exempting payments in lieu of taxes received or receivable with regards to renewable energy projects from local governments' tax cap calculations
